message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can take the smaller share, I'll take the majority!
I'll take a slightly larger share, but still fair!
You're getting greedy, I'll take a bigger share this time!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but still a fair deal!
I'll take the lion's share, it's now or never!
